answerText: Kirkwood Gaps[10] Some of the asteroids that do lie in the Kirkwood Gaps such as the Alinda family have a high value of this, which in their case is between .4 and .65. This value measures just how non-circular an orbit is.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Haverford and Michigan State B | 7 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These occur at 2.5, 2.82, and 3.27 AU, which correspond to the 3:1, 5:2 and 2:1 orbital resonances with Jupiter. For 10 points each: [10] Name these sections of the asteroid belt which are notably absent of asteroids.
